section.p: You tell the high priest that you wish to renounce the worship of Nagil. He shows you your reflection in a mirror, then shatters it against the altar. When you ask if you must pay compensation to the temple, he shakes his head. ‘It is you who loses, not we.’

Do you want to reconsider?
If you are determined to renounce your faith,
delete Nagil from the God box
on your Adventure Sheet. You must lose any outstanding resurrection arrangements. Also lose the title Chosen One of Nagil if you have it.
